subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement I : The electronegativity of group elements from to gradually decreases. Statement II : Group In the light of the above statements, choose the most appropriate from the options given below :

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
contains non-metallic, metallic, as well as metalloid elements.
